name: FraudRadar
author: FraudRadar

sections.description:
FraudRadar is a platform to assist you to filter any spam account registration/login/purchase on e-commerce platform to save your time.

Spam Accounts prevent you from focusing on the actual customers you had in your system. It decreases the efficiency of marketting and database management. Let FraudRadar help you eliminate spam accounts in your system to increase effecient marketting, removing spam entries and potential fraud payments that will come later on.

Additionally, you can track any fraud action by submiting details of the action (payment, change in billing/shipping details, any major custom action in your business) to FraudRadar to inspect the fraud score of the customer. That way you can flag the action for review or you can directly reject by the validation rules.

You can create rules to decide how risk score will be calculated. Each business has its own spamming/fraud needs, and you may use FraudRadar rules to make simple or comlicated set of rules to decide which action will be reviewed and which action will be rejected. FraudRadar will help you to focus on your business instead of daily problems of internet world.

You can benefit from our SDK, plugins and API to access spam/fraud scoring system. We support several well known CRM systems, e-commerce platforms for you. For such cases you just download and activate the plugin and let FraudRadar do what she knows best: Filtering the spammers and fraud actions.

Machine Learning is used to flag emails that has unconventional naming convension, inspect IP actions, email&name matching to decide if an activity is potentially spam. Inspecting existing spam signatures in our wast database, lets FraudRadar forecast better.

Please check our website https://www.fraudradar.io for details.

More Information

Signup for a free account to get your API Key https://app.fraudradar.io/auth/register and try out FraudRadar services.
sections.faq:
How to enable the FraudRadar

  1. Click on the FraudRadar menu page.
  2. Enter your FraudRadar API Key. You can sign up for a free API key at https://app.fraudradar.io/auth/register.
  3. Click on the Save button.

Where do I get API Key

You should visit https://app.fraudradar.io to get an account and API Key to use.

What can I do with FraudRadar

FraudRadar has two kinds of prevention mechanism with your application
1. Registration/Login
2. E-Commerce

Depending on your decision, from this two types of activities you may choose which type of action should be triggered if user is flagged as fraud.

I have entered API key but it warns me about Credits

FraudRadar works with credit mechanism and you will have free credits per month, if you exceed monthly free limit, you should consider upgrading your
FraudRadar account to a higher tier by subscribing to a plan.

What do you mean By “Allow By” in FraudRadar Settings

To approve an action (user registration, login, e-commerce activities) you may whether choose a status returned by FraudRadar (ie. Approve, Reject, Review) or
Risk score again provided by FraudRadar (a value between 0-100, higher the value riskier the user action)

How do we use FraudRadar application

For FraudRadar.io specific FAQs, please visit our website https://fraudradar.io/faq/.
sections.changelog:
2.1.0

  • Updated: Added WooCommerce support

2.0.1

  • BugFix: Fix loading of feedback files at non-plugins page
  • BugFix: Correctly handle user attribute

2.0.0

  • Updated: Provided feedback support during deactivation
  • Updated: Added api key modal during activation of the plugin

1.0.4

  • Updated: Updated documentation

1.0.3

  • Updated: Added new endpoints to WP plugin

1.0.2

  • Updated: Updated API Key url at settings page

1.0.1

  • Updated: Tested up to version updated to ensure users know full compatibility with WordPress v6.0

1.0.0

  • New: Initial release of FraudRadar WordPress plugin

short_description: Allows you to detect fraud/spam accounts. It automatically prevents for such accounts to access to your site or e-commerce actions.
